Comment: Trace antennas are cheaper, but this seemed like a less failure-prone option for a first attempt.

50Ω matching filter capacitor. I used the values from ST's evaluation board, figuring they'd probably be fairly close. Ideal values will vary based on your board stackup. Prefer high-quality ceramic capacitors (C0G/NP0)
Another 50Ω matching filter capacitor.
Power supply decoupling capacitors. Prefer X5/X7 ceramic capacitors.
SMPS decoupling capacitors for the built-in switching power supply. Prefer X5/X7 ceramic capacitors.
Filtering capacitors for the 32.768KHz 'Low-Speed External' crystal oscillator. Prefer high-quality C0G/NP0 ceramic capacitors.
Decoupling capacitors for the 3.3V voltage regulator. Prefer X5/X7 ceramic capacitors.
Filtering capacitor that sits between the 2.45GHz bandpass filter and the antenna. Prefer X7 ceramic capacitor.
Decoupling capacitor for the reset line.
Schottky diode to protect against reverse polarity.
LED indicator connected to pin E4.
Bandpass filter which goes between the 50Ω impedance matching network and the antenna.
Programming header; reset, SWDIO, SWCLK, ground, power input. These pin headers are commodities, and it's much chepaer to order them in bulk 1x40 rows.
USB-A plug, since the chip has a USB peripheral.
GPIO pin headers, for plugging into a breadboard or socket.
Fit a jumper here to disable the internal switching power supply. Requires a corresponding firmware configuration.
50Ω matching filter inductor. Again, the value is from ST's reference design.
A ferrite bead to filter out high-frequency noise on the analog voltage pin.
Inductor for the internal switching power supply.
Pull-down resistor for the 'BOOT0' pin.
Pull-up resistor for the reset pin. This probably isn't needed since the chips have an internal ~47KΩ pull-up on this pin, but the reference design has a pull-up so I included one.
Resistor for the LED indicator. Adjust depending on how bright or dim you want the LED to be.
Core microcontroller; available with either 512KB or 1MB of Flash memory.
500mA low-dropout linear voltage regulator.
Low-Speed External' crystal oscillator.
High-Speed External' crystal oscillator.
